titleStmt.title: A Pindaric ode, sacred to the memory of the Most Reverend Father in God, Dr. William Sancroft once master of Emmanuel College in Cambridge, and late arch-bishop of Canterbury, who departed this life November 24th. 1693.
titleStmt.author: J. D.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.B., and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Assigned by Wing to "J.D.", but perhaps confused with "A pindarique ode: humbly offer'd to the ever-blessed memory of ... Queen Mary" by Samuel Cobb but published under the initials "J.D."
